thread.title: Barry Morguloff
thread.title_full: Fireplace Remote Controls reviewed by Barry Morguloff

author: Barry Morguloff
title: Barry Morguloff
text:
I purchased a Pilot assembly for my outdoor fireplace and it would not work correctly because I tried to splice the ignition wires and the spark would ark at the splice for some reason so I had to purchase another one.
Finally I ordered the correct size and replaced the pilot line from the control box up to the fireplace. The new assembly cane with GREAT insulation around the wire leads so hopefully it will not burn them. That has been my problem all along. The wires kept getting burned I have been through 4 Pilot assembly's because the builder made the place for the pilot on the left side of the fireplace not the right so it had to be modified Long story but I think I am good now I have rapped the wires in welders cloth and covered them with sand, so far so good.
